info.official_title: A Phase I/II , Open-label, Multi-center, Multi-cohort Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics, and Efficacy of HYP-6589 Monotherapy in Advanced Solid Tumors and Combination With Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitors in Patients With Advanced NSCLC With Target-driven Gene Positivity

inclusion_lines.line: * Voluntarily sign an informed consent form, understand the study and be willing and able to follow and complete all trial procedures;

criterions.exact_snippets: Voluntarily sign an informed consent form
understand the study
be willing and able to follow and complete all trial procedures

inclusion_lines.line: * ≥18 years old and ≤80 years old, gender: male or female;

criterions.exact_snippets: ≥18 years old and ≤80 years old
gender: male or female

inclusion_lines.line: * Histological or cytological confirmation of unresectable and/or metastatic advanced solid tumors;

criterions.exact_snippets: Histological or cytological confirmation of unresectable and/or metastatic advanced solid tumors
criterions.criterion: unresectable and/or metastatic advanced solid tumors

inclusion_lines.line: * At least one measurable lesion (according to RECIST 1.1 version);

criterions.exact_snippets: At least one measurable lesion (according to RECIST 1.1 version)

inclusion_lines.line: * Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status score is 0 or 1;

criterions.exact_snippets: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status score is 0 or 1
Life expectancy ≥3 months

inclusion_lines.line: * Participant must have adequate main organ function;

criterions.exact_snippets: adequate main organ function

inclusion_lines.line: * Fertile female patients must have a negative serological pregnancy test within 7 days before the first dosing and be willing to use effective birth control/contraception to prevent pregnancy during the study period up to 6 months after the last dosing of the study. Male patients must agree to have no sperm donation plans and to use effective contraceptive methods during the study period until 6 months after the last dose of the study. Postmenopausal women must have amenorrhea for at least 12 months before they are considered infertile.

criterions.exact_snippets: Fertile female patients must have a negative serological pregnancy test within 7 days before the first dosing

requirements.expected_value: within 7 days before the first dosing

criterions.exact_snippets: Fertile female patients ... be willing to use effective birth control/contraception to prevent pregnancy during the study period up to 6 months after the last dosing of the study

requirements.expected_value: during the study period up to 6 months after the last dosing

criterions.exact_snippets: Male patients must agree to have no sperm donation plans
Male patients ... to use effective contraceptive methods during the study period until 6 months after the last dose of the study

requirements.expected_value: during the study period until 6 months after the last dose

criterions.exact_snippets: Postmenopausal women must have amenorrhea for at least 12 months before they are considered infertile
Healthy volunteers allowed

inclusion_lines.line: Must have minimum age of 18 Years

criterions.exact_snippets: minimum age of 18 Years

inclusion_lines.line: Must have maximum age of 80 Years

criterions.exact_snippets: maximum age of 80 Years

exclusion_lines.line: * Participants who have received other investigational drugs or participated in interventional medical device studies within 4 weeks prior to the first administration of the study drug;

criterions.exact_snippets: Participants who have received other investigational drugs

requirements.expected_value: within 4 weeks prior to the first administration of the study drug

criterions.exact_snippets: participated in interventional medical device studies
criterions.criterion: participation in interventional medical device studies

requirements.expected_value: within 4 weeks prior to the first administration of the study drug

exclusion_lines.line: * Participants who have received (attenuated) live vaccines within 4 weeks prior to the first administration of the study drug;

criterions.exact_snippets: Participants who have received (attenuated) live vaccines within 4 weeks prior to the first administration of the study drug

exclusion_lines.line: * Participants who have undergone major organ surgery (excluding biopsy) within 4 weeks prior to the first administration of the study drug or have experienced significant trauma, or who require elective major organ surgery (excluding biopsy) during the study period;

criterions.exact_snippets: undergone major organ surgery (excluding biopsy) within 4 weeks prior to the first administration of the study drug
experienced significant trauma
require elective major organ surgery (excluding biopsy) during the study period

exclusion_lines.line: * Participants who, based on computerized tomography (CT) or magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) examinations conducted during the screening period and before radiological assessment, have uncontrolled, unstable, or active central nervous system (CNS) metastases;

criterions.exact_snippets: uncontrolled, unstable, or active central nervous system (CNS) metastases

exclusion_lines.line: * Participants with clinically uncontrollable hypertension (defined in this protocol as having a systolic blood pressure > 150 mmHg and/or a diastolic blood pressure > 100 mmHg despite antihypertensive treatment, and which is considered clinically significant by the investigator);

criterions.exact_snippets: clinically uncontrollable hypertension (defined in this protocol as having a systolic blood pressure > 150 mmHg and/or a diastolic blood pressure > 100 mmHg despite antihypertensive treatment
clinically significant by the investigator

requirements.expected_value: considered clinically significant by the investigator

exclusion_lines.line: * Participants who have received allogenic tissue/organ transplants in the past;

criterions.exact_snippets: Participants who have received allogenic tissue/organ transplants

exclusion_lines.line: * Participants with active infections deemed inappropriate for entry into the study by the investigator;

criterions.exact_snippets: active infections

exclusion_lines.line: * Participants with uncontrolled third-space effusion requiring clinical intervention;

criterions.exact_snippets: uncontrolled third-space effusion requiring clinical intervention

exclusion_lines.line: * Participants with a history of drug abuse or medical, psychological, or social conditions that may interfere with study participation or impair the assessment of study outcomes;

criterions.exact_snippets: history of drug abuse
medical, psychological, or social conditions that may interfere with study participation
medical, psychological, or social conditions that may ... impair the assessment of study outcomes
criterions.criterion: conditions impairing assessment of study outcomes

exclusion_lines.line: * Participants with known gastrointestinal (GI) dysfunction or GI diseases that are likely to significantly affect the absorption or metabolism of oral medications (e.g., dysphagia, active upper gastrointestinal ulcer, intestinal obstruction, nausea, vomiting, and diarrhea of grade 3 or higher that persist despite optimal supportive care within 3 days);

criterions.exact_snippets: known gastrointestinal (GI) dysfunction or GI diseases
likely to significantly affect the absorption or metabolism of oral medications
criterions.criterion: effect on absorption or metabolism of oral medications

criterions.exact_snippets: dysphagia
active upper gastrointestinal ulcer
intestinal obstruction
nausea
vomiting
diarrhea of grade 3 or higher
persist despite optimal supportive care within 3 days

exclusion_lines.line: * Participant whose toxicities from previous anti-cancer therapy have not resolved, defined as toxicity (hair loss excluded) that has not resolved to grade ≤1 (CTCAE 5.0 version, peripheral neuropathy, ≤grade 2; exclusion criteria specified);

criterions.exact_snippets: toxicities from previous anti-cancer therapy have not resolved
toxicity (hair loss excluded) that has not resolved to grade ≤1 (CTCAE 5.0 version
peripheral neuropathy, ≤grade 2

exclusion_lines.line: * Female participants who are breastfeeding or have positive urine or blood pregnancy test results during the screening period; female participants who have a planned pregnancy, sperm donation, or egg donation during the study period or within 6 months after the last study drug administration;

criterions.exact_snippets: Female participants who are breastfeeding
positive urine or blood pregnancy test results during the screening period
female participants who have a planned pregnancy
female participants who have a planned ... sperm donation
female participants who have a planned ... egg donation

exclusion_lines.line: * Known history of hypersensitivity to any of the components of the test formulation.

criterions.exact_snippets: Known history of hypersensitivity to any of the components of the test formulation.
criterions.criterion: hypersensitivity to components of the test formulation

exclusion_lines.line: * Participants who have had other malignancies within the past 5 years, excluding cured cervical carcinoma in situ, basal cell carcinoma of the skin or squamous cell carcinoma of the skin;

criterions.exact_snippets: Participants who have had other malignancies within the past 5 years
excluding cured cervical carcinoma in situ
excluding ... basal cell carcinoma of the skin
criterions.criterion: basal cell carcinoma of the skin

criterions.exact_snippets: excluding ... squamous cell carcinoma of the skin
criterions.criterion: squamous cell carcinoma of the skin
